review_data.title: Great fun, lots of meat!
review_data.content: You'll have to book well in advance to get a weekend table at La Cote but it's well worth the wait. Grilling all-you-can-eat meat at your table isn't something you get to do often in Zürich (especially the all-you-can-eat part!). It's definitely worth taking the...More

review_data.title: The La Cote is a unique french Restaurant...
review_data.content: The La Cote is a unique french Restaurant in Zürich for similar food you would have to trvael to the french part. The Charbonnade is thinly sliced beef grilled on a charcoal pot on the table. Along with that you get "pommes d'allumette" french fries...More

review_data.title: It was good, but expensive
